comment.author: 17264356@N00
comment._content: You know, you have around 1,200 photos when you search the LoC stream for "baseball", but there are only 23 in the Baseball set. Why?

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: We shared this set on Flickr to highlight selections from the book "Baseball Americana: Treasures from the Library of Congress." We're glad your finding some of the hundreds of other LC baseball images in our other Flickr sets. You can find even more in the Library's Prints & Photographs Online Catalog, www.loc.gov/pictures/

comment.author: 59770168@N07
comment._content: This set is fascinating in many ways. The poses the players assume for the photographer set a standard for baseball players for decades. The players often look like the rough-and-tumble lot that they were in that era. Finally, it is interesting to look at the background in some of the images to see the atmosphere of the ballpark and the features of the park itself. So pleased that you added this set!
